trends: There has been one other sighting in Spencer
There were no other sightings in Spencer on or around October 16th 2013
Summary: Saw 13 glowing orange lights going from W to ESE in a stright line disappearing after about 5 minutes.
divs: sighting detailson wednesday 10\16\13 at about 8:30 pm i was sitting on my patio drinking a cup of coffee (i live in an apt.) i noticed an orange light in the western sky.continued to watch and saw a total of 13 orange lights going from west. to east south east in a stright line. they vanished about 60 degrees east from the point of origin.my neighbours came out about half way through and they saw them as well.didn't call 911 until it was all over.i don't think the sheriff's even logged th call still have no idea what we saw.the sighting lasted about 5 munutes.didn't have a canera.
